message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn to decide!
I'll match your initial offer, but I'd like to make it more interesting. Your turn!
Not quite yet, Bob. I'll wait for a better offer. You can do better than a 50-50 split!
I'm still looking for a better deal, Bob. Meet me in the middle?
I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I think this is a fair compromise. Your turn to decide!
Not quite there, Bob. I need a bit more to make it worth my while.
Last chance, Bob. Meet me in the middle or I'll take the rest.
I'm not giving up yet. I'll take a smaller share, but I want to make sure I get a good deal. Your turn to think!
Too generous, Bob. You're trying to take advantage of the inflation. I want a bigger share!
Time's running out, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to let you get the better deal. I'll take a smaller share, but I'm not backing down!
You've got to be kidding me, Bob. That's an insult. I'm not accepting such a lowball offer.
I'll meet you in the middle, Bob. But this is my final compromise.
